description: The Since 2012 Long Sleeve Tee is made from a premium 100 % organic cotton jersey and offers a soft and comfortable feel. Designed in a regular fit, it provides a relaxed and flattering look that is true to size. You can feel confident in its sustainable and high-quality construction thanks to the GOTS and Oeko-Tex® standard 100 certifications.
name: Hooke Since 2012 LS Tee - Mens
